text: 31:33 Jeremaia 24:7; 32:40; Hibru 10:16Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn ia mɨgei, Gɨn izamin dughiam otoghtɨ, kɨ Israel ko Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim damightɨ, a kamaghɨn mangam: Kɨ uan araziba men nɨghnɨzibar arɨgh, egh da isɨva men navir averiabar da osiram. Egh kɨ men Godɨn ikɨtɨma me nan gumazamizibar ikiam.
